virtual int iorn::CSigmoidalObjectronComp::DoLearning ( const ILearningSet &  learningSet,
const ILearnFeedback *  learnFeedbackPtr,
bool  isProgressive = false 
) [virtual]

Do learning process.

There are generally two kinds of learning: supervised and unsupervised. For supervised learning you have to provide ILearnFeedback object used to retrive supervisor information.

Parameters:
inputLearningSet set of learning input examples.
learnFeedbackPtr pointer to learn feedback. It is necessary for supervised learning.
isProgressive if true, the progressive learning is enabled, it means only correction of current state should be done.

Implements iorn::IObjectron.
